description: A protocol that empowers the agent to modify its own core tooling, enabling a recursive self-improvement cycle.

rules.description: The agent is authorized to use the 'modify_tooling' action within the self_correction_orchestrator.py to apply patches to its own source code or other tools in the tooling/ directory. This action must be triggered by a structured lesson in knowledge_core/lessons.jsonl.
rules.enforcement: The self_correction_orchestrator.py must validate that the 'modify_tooling' action is well-formed and targets a valid file within the tooling/ directory.
